flavor.reason: The flavor of the dishes was inconsistent, with some standout items but also several complaints about blandness, over-salting, and improper preparation.

freshness.reason: Freshness varied, with some dishes praised for their ingredients while others were criticized for being reheated or improperly prepared.

service.reason: Service quality was mixed, ranging from friendly and attentive to slow and inattentive, depending on the time and staff.

environment.reason: The ambiance was generally appreciated, with cozy outdoor seating and a neighborhood charm, though some found the interior design mismatched.

value.reason: Value was debated, with some diners finding prices reasonable while others felt the food was overpriced for the portion sizes and quality.
